  • Element
com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase

Annotation Type HBaseSchema


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={TYPE,FIELD})
@Inherited
public @interface HBaseSchema

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean blockCacheEnabled
      Changes value for Store.getBlockCacheEnabled() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      int blockSize
      Changes value for Store.getBlockSize() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      String bloomFilterType
      Changes value for Store.getMaxVersions() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      String compression
      Changes value for Store.getCompression() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean deferredLogFlush
      Changes value for Store.getDeferredLogFlush() for a particular persisting class (ignored on column families).
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceBlockCacheEnabled
      Changes value for Store.isForceBlockCacheEnabled() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceBlockSize
      Changes value for Store.isForceBlockSize() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceBloomFilterType
      Changes value for Store.isForceBloomFilterType() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceCompression
      Changes value for Store.isInMemory() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceDeferredLogFlush
      Changes value for Store.isForceDeferredLogFlush() for a particular persisting class (ignored on column families).
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceInMemory
      Changes value for Store.isForceInMemory() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceMaxVersions
      Changes value for Store.isForceMaxVersions() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceReplicationScope
      Changes value for Store.isForceReplicationScope() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceTimeToLive
      Changes value for Store.isForceTimeToLive() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean inMemory
      Changes value for Store.isInMemory() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      int maxVersions
      Changes value for Store.getMaxVersions() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      int replicationScope
      Changes value for Store.getReplicationScope() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      int scanCaching
      Sets a default value for Store.getScanCaching() for this PersistingElement or ColumnFamily.
      int timeToLiveInSeconds
      Changes value for Store.getTimeToLiveSeconds() for a particular persisting class or column family.
      HBaseSchema.WALWritePolicy writeToWAL
      Whether or not to use the Write Away Log (WAL) while storing this PersistingElement (default is true).

    • Element Detail

      • forceCompression

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceCompression
        Changes value for Store.isInMemory() for a particular persisting class or column family. WARNING: to be used with great care in case of use in multiprocess context.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET

      • compression

        public abstract String compression
        Changes value for Store.getCompression() for a particular persisting class or column family. Value "" or describing an unknown compressor is equivalent to an unset value.
        Default:
        ""

      • scanCaching

        public abstract int scanCaching
        Sets a default value for Store.getScanCaching() for this PersistingElement or ColumnFamily. Value less or equal than 0 is equivalent to an unset value. In case different column families are read at same time, the lowest value is taken. In case a value is defined at family level for at least one of the activated families (see PersistingElement.activate(String...)), class- and store-level scan caching is ignored.
        Default:
        -1

      • writeToWAL

        public abstract HBaseSchema.WALWritePolicy writeToWAL
        Whether or not to use the Write Away Log (WAL) while storing this PersistingElement (default is true). In case more than one column family are implied in a store, strongest policy is used for the complete store.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.WALWritePolicy.UNSET

      • forceInMemory

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceInMemory
        Changes value for Store.isForceInMemory() for a particular persisting class or column family. WARNING: to be used with great care in case of use in multiprocess context.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET

      • inMemory

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean inMemory
        Changes value for Store.isInMemory() for a particular persisting class or column family.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET

      • forceTimeToLive

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceTimeToLive
        Changes value for Store.isForceTimeToLive() for a particular persisting class or column family. WARNING: to be used with great care in case of use in multiprocess context.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET

      • timeToLiveInSeconds

        public abstract int timeToLiveInSeconds
        Changes value for Store.getTimeToLiveSeconds() for a particular persisting class or column family.
        Default:
        -1

      • forceMaxVersions

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceMaxVersions
        Changes value for Store.isForceMaxVersions() for a particular persisting class or column family. WARNING: to be used with great care in case of use in multiprocess context.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET

      • maxVersions

        public abstract int maxVersions
        Changes value for Store.getMaxVersions() for a particular persisting class or column family.
        Default:
        -1

      • forceBloomFilterType

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceBloomFilterType
        Changes value for Store.isForceBloomFilterType() for a particular persisting class or column family. WARNING: to be used with great care in case of use in multiprocess context.
        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET

      • bloomFilterType

        public abstract String bloomFilterType
        Changes value for Store.getMaxVersions() for a particular persisting class or column family. Possible values are those from StoreFile.BloomType, e.g. "NONE" (default), "ROW", or "ROWCOL"
        Default:
        ""

      • forceBlockCacheEnabled

        public abstract HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean forceBlockCacheEnabled

        Default:
        com.googlecode.n_orm.hbase.HBaseSchema.SettableBoolean.UNSET
